name: imitable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
possible or easy to imitate (= copy or behave in a similar way to someone or something else): He had a distinctive look and an imitable voice. This style of architecture was very imitable, even though a lot of the imitations were rather boring.
More examplesFewer examplesWhile far from being an imitable model, the work establishes new criteria for the consideration of art. What we like to believe is natural and unique is in fact conditioned and imitable.These experiments seem to be imitable, although they do depend on large collections of data.
